/I am coming out for the first time here, The first day I joined college some seniors made fun of my doraemon tshirt and threw hot coffee on my. I still feel a lingering burn on me whenever I think of it
The second time I was ragged it was much more severe. They pressured one of my class mates to tell me that a girl wants to confess to me. I was told to go to a corner where there weren't many people. I was beaten up and dirty water they had taken from the bathroom was thrown on me. I had to lie to the doctor that the bruises were just from me falling down
I go to college in constant fear and constantly look around scanning for them. At break times I hid in the bathrooms to not get bullied. The staff won't do anything about it since they don't have any proof and everyone signed an "anti-ragging" Form.j
